member.summary: Change amount of energy according to consuming per 100km and changing location of a spaceship.
member.returns: false in a case of out of an energy true in a case of a successful energy intake

member.name: M:PlariumArcade.Model.Actions.ActionController.BuyEnergy(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Implements the purchase of energy. The price is adjusted depending on the amount of purchased energy and the availability of delivery.
member.exception: Throws in a case of illegal entered data
member.returns: true if the purchase was successfylly done. false if there's not enough money for purchase or there's no place to keep bought energy.

member.name: M:PlariumArcade.Model.Actions.ActionController.Buy(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Implements interaction with Ship data. Takes away fixed amount of money for purchasing Adds purchased energy.
member.returns: true if the data change was successfylly done. false if there's no place to keep bought energy.

member.name: M:PlariumArcade.Model.Actions.ActionController.SellOre(System.String)
member.summary: Implements selling collected ore.The price is adjusted depending on the amount of selling ore.
member.exception: Throws in a case of illegal entered data

member.name: M:PlariumArcade.Model.Actions.ActionController.Sell(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Implements interaction with Ship data. Takes away fixed amount of ore for selling Adds earned money.

member.name: T:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.Asteroid
member.summary: Asteroid- one of the main objects in a game. Characterized by unique name, tile(image) and amount of ore. Allows dig an ore from it. In a case of having 0 amount of ore deletes itself.Inherits from a Planet.

member.name: P:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.Asteroid.AmountOfOre
member.summary: Amount of available ore to collect.

member.name: M:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.Asteroid.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Constructor initialize an amount of ore by a random value between 100 and 1000, generates a random name and set an image.

member.name: T:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.NameGenerator
member.summary: the generator class is used to generate the names of asteroids and planets according to satellite names and random names

member.name: F:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.NameGenerator.chars
member.summary: available characters for generating the asteroid name

member.name: F:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.NameGenerator.satellites
member.summary: available satellite names to generate asteroid name

member.name: M:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.NameGenerator.GenerateName(System.Object)
member.summary: method for generating a name based on the type of object (planet \ asteroid)

member.name: T:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.Planet
member.summary: Planet- one of the main objects in a game. Characterized by unique name and a tile(image). Allows dig an ore from it. Has endless ore reserves.

member.summary: Planet name. Generates from satellites of the planets names.

member.summary: Planet image.

member.summary: Constructor inicializes a planet image.
member.exception: Throws when an image is null.

member.name: T:PlariumTestGame.Model.Entities.CoreEntities.Spaceship
member.summary: The core object in a game. Controls by a user. Characterized by a big amount of characteristics, including a matrix of ship modules, current position(coordinates), amount of cryptocurrency, image and so on. Implements an observer pattern with the aim of future ViewModel layer notifying.
